sqlMap.select: SELECT A.USER_ID , A.USER_NM , A.AUTH_CD , A.SIGUN_CD , A.MOBILE , (SELECT mclass_nm FROM gs_m_class WHERE hclass_cd = 'G089' AND odr = A.SIGUN_CD) AS sigunCdNm , B.CNS_GB , B.CENTER_GB , B.CNSR_GB , B.LOCAL_GB , B.ZONE_GB , B.APPRV_YN , (SELECT CENTER_GB FROM GS_CENTER_M WHERE NUM = B.CENTER_GB) AS centerNm FROM GS_USER_M AS A INNER JOIN GS_CNSR_M AS B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.USER_ID = #userId# AND A.PW = #pw#
